extendedInfo.description: Summary.1. This App can screen on / off without power button.2. You can use a pseudo "Smart cover" with feature combination3. This App is a just test App for "DK Screen OnOff".  "DK Screen OnOff" have NO Ad Screen after screen on.2012 / 09 / 131. Fixed "No Lock" function's bug.2. If "No Lock" caused a problem, but other functions are useful,     remove and reinstall this app and do not use "No Lock" function. ^^2012 / 09 / 121. "No Lock" Option is added.   This Option can prevent Lock Screen.2. "Magic On" + "Magic Off" + "No Lock" = "Smart Cover"    For settings, refer to first capture image.----------------------------The paid version is published.  "DK Screen OnOff".Same with this App. but no Ad screen after screen on.if you are satisfied this App, you should purchase paid version.For remove this App, "Magic Off" Option must be unchecked.or, setting -> Location & security -> Select device administrators and uncheck option.-- usage.A. "Shake ON" mode1. for Nexus One : Hold volume key, and shake it.2. for other phone: just shake it. and.. To prevent unwanted turned on, proximity sensors are used. (it does not work when phone inside of bags, pouches, cases.)B. "Magic ON" mode - When The awareness of the proximity sensor "close" to "far",  turns on the LCD.1. When you pull out the phone from your pocket.2. When you shake hand on your phone's LCD (hi~)C. "Volume+Shake" mode 1. same with first version.  2. For some phone like nexus one's feature..  (Tausif's motolola..)D. "Magic Off" option. 1. This option need "Device Manager" Permission. 2. If this option is activated, proximity sensor is working and "close" is maintaining given second, Screen will be lock. 3. This option is useful for people who use "folder case". E. "No Lock" 1. This Option can prevent Lock Screen. 2. "Magic On" + "Magic Off" + "No Lock" = almost "Smart Cover". in my opinion..    For settings, refer to first capture image. 3. If "No Lock" caused a problem, but other functions are useful,     remove and reinstall this app and do not use "No Lock" function. ^^    This App is depend on device's characteristic.F. When you attach the headset will turn on the LCD too.G. Auto restart when phone rebooted.If this App not working, simply remove it. ^^This link is the way to boot without power on button. NexusOne. http://blog.naver.com/mudice/40149426091

reviews.title: Good app, get DK Screen OnOff...
reviews.comment: Works perfectly except the app pops up after every single time the phone unlocks. If you read the comments, that\'s because this is just a test app for \"DK Screen OnOff\".
